description: The company says its biosensors can detect viruses and other targets at the point of care.
title: Biotech Startup Monod Bio Collects $25 Million Seed Financing
title_page: Biotech Startup Monod Bio Collects $25 Million Seed Financing
maintext:
Startup Monod Bio Inc. has secured $25 million in seed financing to develop a new technology designed to speed disease detection and help physicians manage patients with chronic conditions.
Seattle-based Monod is developing an instrument that could be used for diagnostic applications at the point of care. Monod hasn’t revealed its initial...
